com.tmquoridor.Board

Class Coord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tmquoridor.Board.Coord

  • public class Coord
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a simple coordinate (x, y).

      • getDirMoved

        public static Direction getDirMoved(Coord src,
                                    Coord dest)
        Gets the direction moved from a source to a destination Coord.
        Parameters:
        src - the Coord to test from
        dest - the Coord to test to
        Returns:
        a Direction moved; null if diagonal or if src == dest

      • translate

        public Coord translate(Direction dir)
                throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Translates a Coord by Direction
        Parameters:
        dir - the Direction to move
        Returns:
        the resulting Coord (bounded if OoB) if the move would be made.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the internal Direction processing returns a null pointer

        Returns:
